r.d: Yar(Yet another RPC framework) is a light, concurrent RPC framework, supports multi package protocols (json, msgpack)
r.n: - Added ::__info() magic method for custom server info - Support __auth(by introduced YAR_OPT_PROVIDER/TOKEN) - Respect provider/token on tcp transportor - Fixed package/unpack with json/serialize - refactor struct for better performance(ABI break?)
